description: Detects netsh commands that configure a port forwarding of port 3389 used for RDP
name: Netsh RDP Port Forwarding
query: (process.executable:*\\netsh.exe AND process.command_line:*i* AND process.command_line:*\ p* AND process.command_line:*\=3389* AND process.command_line:*\ c*)
author: Florian Roth
oscd.community
